mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of John Harman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of John Harman Mary Harman, Widow James Harman, Son Margaret Hylton, Daughter Samuel Conduff, Grandson Laura G. Benes, Granddaughter Lura A. Conduff, Granddaughter Daniel W. Conduff, Grandson Eddie Conduff, Grandson Nancy Conduff, Daughter S.G. Conduff, Administrator Jacob Hylton, Administrator Recorded in Ledger Book 5, Page 9, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
